00299 //
00300 // Fonctions de calcul des flux pour une grandeur scalaire
00301 //
00302 
00303 ////!< flux_face avec Dirichlet_entree_fluide 
00304 //
00305 
00306 inline double Eval_centre_PolyMAC_Elem::flux_face(const DoubleTab& inco, int face,
00307                                                   const Dirichlet_entree_fluide& la_cl,
00308                                                   int num1) const
00309 {
00310   int n0 = elem_(face,0);
00311   int n1 = elem_(face,1);
00312   double flux;
00313   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
00314   double T_imp = la_cl.val_imp(face-num1);
00315   if (n0 != -1)
00316     {
00317       if (psc > 0)
00318         flux= psc*inco[n0];
00319       else
00320         flux= psc*T_imp;
00321     }
00322   else   //!< n1 != -1
00323     {
00324       if (psc>0)
00325         flux= psc*T_imp;
00326       else
00327         flux= psc*inco[n1];
00328     }
00329   return -flux;
00330 }
00331 
00332 ////!< coeffs_face avec Dirichlet_entree_fluide 
00333 //
00334 
00335 inline void Eval_centre_PolyMAC_Elem::coeffs_face(int face, int num1,const Dirichlet_entree_fluide& la_cl,
00336                                                   double& aii, double& ajj) const
00337 {
00338   int i = elem_(face,0);
00339 // int j = elem(face,1);
00340   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface[face]*porosite[face];
00341 
00342   if (i != -1)
00343     {
00344       if (psc > 0)
00345         aii = -psc;
00346     }
00347   else   //!< j != -1
00348     {
00349       if (psc<0)
00350         ajj = -psc;
00351     }
00352 }
00353 
00354 ////!< secmem_face avec Dirichlet_entree_fluide 
00355 //
00356 
00357 inline double Eval_centre_PolyMAC_Elem::secmem_face(int face, const Dirichlet_entree_fluide& la_cl,
00358                                                     int num1) const
00359 {
00360   int i = elem_(face,0);
00361 // int j = elem(face,1);
00362   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface[face]*porosite[face];
00363   double flux=0;
00364   double T_imp = la_cl.val_imp(face-num1);
00365   if (i != -1)
00366     {
00367       if (psc < 0)
00368         flux = psc*T_imp;
00369     }
00370   else   //!< j != -1
00371     {
00372       if (psc>0)
00373         flux = psc*T_imp;
00374     }
00375   return -flux;
00376 }

00530 ////!< flux_face avec Neumann_sortie_libre 
00531 //
00532 
00533 inline double Eval_centre_PolyMAC_Elem::flux_face(const DoubleTab& inco, int face,
00534                                                   const Neumann_sortie_libre& la_cl, int num1) const
00535 {
00536   int n0 = elem_(face,0);
00537   int n1 = elem_(face,1);
00538   double flux;
00539   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
00540   if (n0 != -1)
00541     {
00542       if (psc > 0)
00543         flux= psc*inco[n0];
00544       else
00545         flux= psc*la_cl.val_ext(face-num1);
00546     }
00547   else   //!< n1 != -1
00548     {
00549       if (psc > 0)
00550         flux=psc*la_cl.val_ext(face-num1);
00551       else
00552         flux= psc*inco[n1];
00553     }
00554   return -flux;
00555 }
00556 
00557 ////!< coeffs_face avec Neumann_sortie_libre 
00558 //
00559 
00560 inline void Eval_centre_PolyMAC_Elem::coeffs_face(int face,int num1, const Neumann_sortie_libre& la_cl,
00561                                                   double& aii, double& ajj) const
00562 {
00563   int i = elem_(face,0);
00564 // int j = elem(face,1);
00565   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
00566   if (i != -1)
00567     {
00568       if (psc > 0)
00569         aii = -psc;
00570     }
00571   else   //!< n1 != -1
00572     {
00573       if (psc < 0)
00574         ajj = -psc;
00575     }
00576 }
00577 
00578 ////!< secmem_face avec Neumann_sortie_libre 
00579 //
00580 
00581 inline double Eval_centre_PolyMAC_Elem::secmem_face(int face, const Neumann_sortie_libre& la_cl, int num1) const
00582 {
00583   double flux=0;
00584   int i = elem_(face,0);
00585 // int j = elem(face,1);
00586   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
00587   if (i != -1)
00588     {
00589       if (psc < 0)
00590         flux = psc*la_cl.val_ext(face-num1);
00591     }
00592   else   //!< j != -1
00593     {
00594       if (psc > 0)
00595         flux = psc*la_cl.val_ext(face-num1);
00596     }
00597   return -flux;
00598 }
00599

00652 ////!< flux_face avec Periodique 
00653 //
00654 
00655 inline double Eval_centre_PolyMAC_Elem::flux_face(const DoubleTab& inco, int face,
00656                                                   const Periodique& la_cl, int ) const
00657 {
00658 // 30/05/2002 : Codage Periodicite.
00659 // ALEX C.
00660   double flux;
00661   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
00662   int n0 = elem_(face,0);
00663   int n1 = elem_(face,1);
00664   int n0_0 = amont_amont(face,0);
00665   int n1_1 = amont_amont(face,1);
00666 
00667 // on applique le schema centre2
00668   flux = qcentre(psc,n0,n1,n0_0,n1_1,face,inco);
00669   return -flux;
00670 }
00671 
00672 ////!< coeffs_face avec Periodique 
00673 //
00674 inline void Eval_centre_PolyMAC_Elem::coeffs_face(int face, int,const Periodique& la_cl, double& aii, double& ajj) const
00675 {
00676 // 30/05/2002 : Codage Periodicite.
00677 // // ALEX C.
00678   int i = elem_(face,0);
00679   int j = elem_(face,1);
00680   int i0_0 = amont_amont(face,0);
00681   int j1_1 = amont_amont(face,1);
00682   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface[face]*porosite[face];
00683 
00684 // on applique le schema centre
00685   if (psc > 0)
00686     aii = -qcentre(psc,i,j,i0_0,j1_1,face,inconnue->valeurs());
00687   else
00688     ajj = -qcentre(psc,i,j,i0_0,j1_1,face,inconnue->valeurs());
00689 }
00690 
00691 ////!< secmem_face avec Periodique 
00692 //
00693 
00694 inline double Eval_centre_PolyMAC_Elem::secmem_face(int, const Periodique&, int ) const
00695 {
00696   return 0;
00697 }
00698 
00699 ////!< flux_faces_interne 
00700 //
00701 
00702 inline double Eval_centre_PolyMAC_Elem::flux_faces_interne(const DoubleTab& inco, int face) const
00703 {
00704   double flux;
00705   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
00706   int n0 = elem_(face,0);
00707   int n1 = elem_(face,1);
00708   int n0_0 = amont_amont(face,0);
00709   int n1_1 = amont_amont(face,1);
00710 
00711   flux = qcentre(psc,n0,n1,n0_0,n1_1,face,inco);
00712   return -flux;
00713 }
00714 
00715 ////!< coeffs_faces_interne 
00716 //
00717 
00718 inline void Eval_centre_PolyMAC_Elem::coeffs_faces_interne(int face, double& aii, double& ajj ) const
00719 {
00720   int i = elem_(face,0);
00721   int j = elem_(face,1);
00722   int i0_0 = amont_amont(face,0);
00723   int j1_1 = amont_amont(face,1);
00724   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface[face]*porosite[face];
00725 
00726   if ( (i0_0 == -1) || (j1_1 == -1) ) //!< on applique le schema amont
00727     if (psc > 0)
00728       aii = -psc;
00729     else
00730       ajj = -psc;
00731 
00732   else  //!< on applique le schema centre
00733     if (psc > 0)
00734       aii = -qcentre(psc,i,j,i0_0,j1_1,face,inconnue->valeurs());
00735     else
00736       ajj = -qcentre(psc,i,j,i0_0,j1_1,face,inconnue->valeurs());
00737 }
00738 
00739 ////!< secmem_faces_interne 
00740 //
00741 
00742 inline double Eval_centre_PolyMAC_Elem::secmem_faces_interne(int) const
00743 {
00744   return 0;
00745 }
00746 
00747 
00748 //
00749 // Fonctions de calcul des flux pour une grandeur vectorielle
00750 //
00751 
00752 ////!< flux_face avec Dirichlet_entree_fluide 
00753 //
00754 
00755 inline void Eval_centre_PolyMAC_Elem::flux_face(const DoubleTab& inco, int face,
00756                                                 const Dirichlet_entree_fluide& la_cl,
00757                                                 int num1, DoubleVect& flux) const
00758 {
00759   int k;
00760   int n0 = elem_(face,0);
00761   int n1 = elem_(face,1);
00762   double psc = dt_vitesse(face)*surface(face)*porosite(face);
00763 
00764   if (n0 != -1)
00765     {
00766       if (psc > 0)
00767         for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
00768           flux(k) = -psc*inco(n0,k);
00769       else
00770         for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
00771           flux(k)= -psc*la_cl.val_imp(face-num1,k);
00772     }
00773   else //!< n1 != -1
00774     {
00775       if (psc>0)
00776         for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
00777           flux(k)= -psc*la_cl.val_imp(face-num1,k);
00778       else
00779         for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
00780           flux(k)= -psc*inco(n1,k);
00781     }
00782 }
00783 
00784 ////!< coeffs_face avec Dirichlet_entree_fluide 
00785 //
00786 
00787 inline void Eval_centre_PolyMAC_Elem::coeffs_face(int face, int num1,const Dirichlet_entree_fluide& la_cl,
00788                                                   DoubleVect& aii, DoubleVect& ajj) const
00789 {
00790   int k;
00791   int i = elem_(face,0);
00792 // int j = elem(face,1);
00793   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
00794   if (i != -1)
00795     {
00796       if (psc > 0)
00797         for(k=0; k<aii.size(); k++)
00798           aii(k) = -psc;
00799     }
00800   else   //!< j != -1
00801     {
00802       if (psc < 0)
00803         for(k=0; k<ajj.size(); k++)
00804           ajj(k) = -psc;
00805     }
00806 }
00807 
00808 ////!< secmem_face avec Dirichlet_entree_fluide 
00809 //
00810 
00811 inline void Eval_centre_PolyMAC_Elem::secmem_face(int face, const Dirichlet_entree_fluide& la_cl, int num1, DoubleVect& flux) const
00812 {
00813   int k;
00814   int i = elem_(face,0);
00815 // int j = elem(face,1);
00816   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
00817   if (i != -1)
00818     {
00819       if (psc < 0)
00820         for(k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
00821           flux(k) = -psc*la_cl.val_imp(face-num1);
00822     }
00823   else   //!< j != -1
00824     {
00825       if (psc > 0)
00826         for(k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
00827           flux(k) = -psc*la_cl.val_imp(face-num1);
00828     }
00829 }

00993 ////!< flux_face avec Neumann_sortie_libre 
00994 //
00995 
00996 inline void Eval_centre_PolyMAC_Elem::flux_face(const DoubleTab& inco, int face,
00997                                                 const Neumann_sortie_libre& la_cl,
00998                                                 int num1, DoubleVect& flux) const
00999 {
01000   int k;
01001   int n0 = elem_(face,0);
01002   int n1 = elem_(face,1);
01003   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
01004   if (n0 != -1)
01005     {
01006       if (psc > 0)
01007         for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
01008           flux(k) = -psc*inco(n0,k);
01009       else
01010         for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
01011           flux(k) = -psc*la_cl.val_ext(face-num1,k);
01012     }
01013   else  //!< n1 != -1
01014     {
01015       if (psc > 0)
01016         for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
01017           flux(k) = -psc*la_cl.val_ext(face-num1,k);
01018       else
01019         for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
01020           flux(k) = -psc*inco(n1,k);
01021     }
01022 }

01031   int i = elem_(face,0);
01032 // int j = elem(face,1);

01034   if (i != -1)
01035     {
01036       if (psc > 0)
01037         for(k=0; k<aii.size(); k++)
01038           aii(k) = -psc;

01041     {

01044           ajj(k) = -psc;
01045     }
01046 }

01126 ////!< flux_face avec Periodique 
01127 //
01128 
01129 inline void Eval_centre_PolyMAC_Elem::flux_face(const DoubleTab& inco, int face,
01130                                                 const Periodique& la_cl,
01131                                                 int, DoubleVect& flux) const
01132 {
01133   int k;
01134   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
01135   int n0 = elem_(face,0);
01136   int n1 = elem_(face,1);
01137   int n0_0 = amont_amont(face,0);
01138   int n1_1 = amont_amont(face,1);
01139 
01140 // on applique le schema centre
01141   qcentre(psc,n0,n1,n0_0,n1_1,face,inco,flux);
01142   for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
01143     flux(k) *= -1;
01144 
01145 }
01146 
01147 ////!< coeffs_face avec Periodique 
01148 //
01149 
01150 inline void Eval_centre_PolyMAC_Elem::coeffs_face(int face,int, const Periodique& la_cl,
01151                                                   DoubleVect& aii, DoubleVect& ajj) const
01152 {
01153   int k;
01154   int i = elem_(face,0);
01155   int j = elem_(face,1);
01156   int i0_0 = amont_amont(face,0);
01157   int j1_1 = amont_amont(face,1);
01158   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface[face]*porosite[face];
01159   ArrOfDouble flux(aii.size());
01160 
01161 // on applique le schema centre2
01162   qcentre(psc,i,j,i0_0,j1_1,face,inconnue->valeurs(),flux);
01163   if (psc > 0)
01164     for (k=0; k<aii.size(); k++)
01165       aii(k) = -flux(k);
01166   else
01167     for (k=0; k<ajj.size(); k++)
01168       ajj(k) = -flux(k);
01169 }
01170

01172 //
01173 
01174 inline void Eval_centre_PolyMAC_Elem::secmem_face(int, const Periodique&,
01175                                                   int, DoubleVect&) const
01176 {
01177   ;
01178 }

01180 ////!< flux_faces_interne 
01181 //
01182 
01183 inline void Eval_centre_PolyMAC_Elem::flux_faces_interne(const DoubleTab& inco,
01184                                                          int face,DoubleVect& flux) const
01185 {
01186   int k;
01187   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
01188   int n0 = elem_(face,0);
01189   int n1 = elem_(face,1);
01190   int n0_0 = amont_amont(face,0);
01191   int n1_1 = amont_amont(face,1);
01192 
01193   /*   if ( (n0_0 == -1) || (n1_1 == -1) ) //!< on applique le schema amont */
01194   /*     if (psc > 0) */
01195   /*       for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++) */
01196   /*         flux(k) = -psc*inco(n0,k); */
01197   /*     else */
01198   /*       for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++) */
01199   /*         flux(k) = -psc*inco(n1,k); */
01200   /*   else //!< on applique le schema centre */
01201   /*     { */
01202   qcentre(psc,n0,n1,n0_0,n1_1,face,inco,flux);
01203   for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
01204     flux(k) *= -1;
01205   /*     } */
01206 }
01207 
01208 ////!< coeffs_faces_interne 
01209 //
01210 
01211 inline void Eval_centre_PolyMAC_Elem::coeffs_faces_interne(int face, DoubleVect& aii, DoubleVect& ajj ) const
01212 {
01213   int k;
01214   int i = elem_(face,0);
01215   int j = elem_(face,1);
01216   int i0_0 = amont_amont(face,0);
01217   int j1_1 = amont_amont(face,1);
01218   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface[face]*porosite[face];
01219   ArrOfDouble flux(aii.size());
01220 
01221   /*   if ( (i0_0 == -1) || (j1_1 == -1) ) //!< on applique le schema amont  */
01222   /*     if (psc > 0) */
01223   /*       for (k=0; k<aii.size(); k++) */
01224   /*         aii(k) = -psc; */
01225   /*     else */
01226   /*       for (k=0; k<ajj.size(); k++) */
01227   /*         ajj(k) = -psc; */
01228 
01229   /*   else  //!< on applique le schema centre_Fram4 */
01230   /*     { */
01231   qcentre(psc,i,j,i0_0,j1_1,face,inconnue->valeurs(),flux);
01232   if (psc > 0)
01233     for (k=0; k<aii.size(); k++)
01234       aii(k) = -flux(k);
01235   else
01236     for (k=0; k<ajj.size(); k++)
01237       ajj(k) = -flux(k);
01238   /*     } */
01239 }

01250 ////!< Fram4 
01251 //
01252 
01253 /* inline double Fram4(const double& s1,const double& s2, */
01254 /*                    const double& s3,const double& s4) */
01255 /* { */
01256 /*   double smin0 = dmin(s4,s2); */
01257 /*   double smax0 = dmax(s4,s2); */
01258 /*   double smin1 = dmin(s3,s1); */
01259 /*   double smax1 = dmax(s3,s1); */
01260 /*   double sr0 = (s3-smin0)/(smax0-smin0+DMINFLOAT); */
01261 /*   double sr1 = (s2-smin1)/(smax1-smin1+DMINFLOAT); */
01262 /*   double fr = 2.*dmax(dabs(sr0-0.5),dabs(sr1-0.5)); */
01263 /*   fr *= fr; */
01264 /*   fr *= fr; */
01265 /*   return dmin(fr,1.0); */
01266 /* } */

01277 
01278 ////!< qcentre pour un champ transporte scalaire 
01279 //
01280 
01281 inline double Eval_centre_PolyMAC_Elem::qcentre(const double& psc, const int num0, const int num1,
01282                                                 const int num0_0, const int num1_1, const int face,
01283                                                 const DoubleTab& transporte) const
01284 {
01285   double flux;
01286 // int ori = orientation(face);
01287 
01288   double T0 = transporte[num0];
01289   double T1 = transporte[num1];
01290 
01291 
01292   flux =  0.5*(T0+T1);
01293 
01294 
01295 // On applique le filtre Fram4:
01296 
01297 // fr = Fram4(T0_0,T0,T1,T1_1);
01298 // flux = ((1.-fr)*flux + fr*trans_amont)*psc;
01299 
01300   return flux*psc;
01301 }
01302 
01303 
01304 ////!< qcentre pour un champ transporte vectoriel 
01305 //
01306 
01307 inline void Eval_centre_PolyMAC_Elem::qcentre(const double& psc, const int num0, const int num1,
01308                                               const int num0_0, const int num1_1, const int face,
01309                                               const DoubleTab& transporte,ArrOfDouble& flux) const
01310 {
01311 
01312   int k;
01313   int ncomp = flux.size_array();
01314 
01315   ArrOfDouble T0(ncomp);
01316   ArrOfDouble T0_0(ncomp);
01317   ArrOfDouble T1(ncomp);
01318   ArrOfDouble T1_1(ncomp);
01319 
01320   for (k=0; k<ncomp; k++)
01321     {
01322       T0(k) = transporte(num0,k);
01323       T0_0(k) = transporte(num0_0,k);
01324       T1(k) = transporte(num1,k);
01325       T1_1(k) = transporte(num1_1,k);
01326     }
01327 
01328 // double g1 = -dx*dx*(dx/2+dxav)/(4*(dx+dxam+dxav)*(dx+dxam)*dxam);
01329 // double g2 =  (dx+2*dxam)*(dx+2*dxav)/(8*dxam*(dx+dxav));
01330 // double g3 = (dx+2*dxam)*(dx+2*dxav)/(8*dxav*(dx+dxam));
01331 // double g4 = -dx*dx*(dx/2+dxam)/(4*(dx+dxam+dxav)*dxav*(dx+dxav));
01332 
01333   for (k=0; k<ncomp; k++)
01334     {
01335       flux(k) =0.5*(  T0(k) + T1(k))   *   psc ;
01336     }
01337 
01338 // On applique le filtre Fram4:
01339 
01340 // for (k=0; k<ncomp; k++)
01341 // {
01342 // fr = Fram4(T0_0(k),T0(k),T1(k),T1_1(k));
01343 // flux(k) = ((1.-fr)*flux(k) + fr*trans_amont(k))*psc;
01344 }
